snippet: Metropolitan State University of Denver’s new policy extended a special tuition rate to illegal immigrants is raising hopes and anger.
abstract: Metropolitan State University of Denver's new policy of extending a special tuition rate to illegal immigrants, which begins this year, has drawn praise from immigration rights activists and the ire of conservatives, who are threatening to sue the university to keep the rate from being put in place.
lead_paragraph: Metropolitan State University of Denver’s new policy extended a special tuition rate to illegal immigrants is raising hopes and anger.

headline.seo: Denver College Policy Aids Illegal Immigrants
headline.main: A College Lifts a Hurdle for Illegal Immigrants
headline.print_headline: A College Lifts a Hurdle For Illegal Immigrants
